A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Movie was absolutely awful. From the opening \"prank call\" I knew it was going to be cringe worthy. It had almost no continuity with the previous movie\, The Force Awakens while still managing to be a play-by-play rip off of Empire Strikes Back for the most part. The sound track also drowned on and on with the same few nostalgic cords. Disney has turned this into a pandering marketing campaign trying to hit all the SWJ points while pushing merchandise.  Story and Character development take a back seat to tone deaf dialog and product placement. Who knew I would miss Jar-Jar.  \n\nOh yes\, I also learned that you can \"drop\" bombs in space...
